name: NU_AnaplasmosisTestsForAnaplasmaSpeciesIgMAntibody
title: NU_Anaplasmosis (Tests for Anaplasma species IgM Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Anaplasma species IgM Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Anaplasma species IgM Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
